price: Kwa hivyo Mwenyezi Mungu anawaadhibu wanaafiki wanaume, na wanaafiki wanawake, na washirikina wanaume, na washirikina wanawake; na anawapokelea toba Waumini wanaume, na Waumini wanawake. Na Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwenye kusamehe, Mwenye kurehemu.
arabic: لِّيُعَذِّبَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقَٰتِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكَٰتِ وَيَتُوبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمَۢا
footnotes: Ili Mwenyezi Mungu awaadhibu wanaafiki wanaume, na wanaafiki wanawake, na washirikina wanaume, na washirikina wanawake; na Mwenyezi Mungu apate kukubali toba za Waumini wanaume, na Waumini wanawake. Na Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwingi wa maghfira, Mwingi wa rehema.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: liyuʿadhiba al-lahu al-munāfiqīna wal-munāfiqāti wal-mush'rikīna wal-mush'rikāti wayatūba al-lahu ʿalā al-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
